alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:00PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM SYSTEM TO BRING SNOW TO THE SAN BERNARDINO AND RIVERSIDE COUNTY MOUNTAINS SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with localized amounts of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...6 PM Saturday to 10 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant reductions in visibility in snow and fog. Snow level will be mostly be around 5000 feet with this storm. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
